summary: During a party at Monster High, a strange force pulls Lagoona Blue, Frankie Stein, Draculaura, Clawdeen Wolf, Toralei Stripe, and Gillington "Gil" Webber to the Great Scarrier Reef. It is ... See full summary Â»
